# Swarthy gerbil

| genus = Gerbillus
| species = aquilus
| authority = Schlitter and Setzer, 1972
}}
The swarthy gerbil (Gerbillus aquilus) is distributed mainly in eastern Iran, southern Afghanistan, and western Pakistan.
